attributes.title: Leaving Home For Sanyas
attributes.description: From the works of Living Enlightened Master Paramahamsa Nithyananda.  This clip is taken from Shiva Sutras discourses titled, "Transcend through the body" and "Don't Think Be Aware".  Swamiji in this clip narrates the beautiful incident when Swamiji announced to his parents about his decision to take Sanyas.  He goes on to say that when a mother lets go of the physical disconnection with her baby there is birth.  When they let go of the psychological connection, it is a great sign of maturity.  Swmaiji tells us that very rarely do people want to explore the inner world and any such adventure to explore into consciousness should be encouraged.   The complete discourses may be ordered online at www.lifeblissgalleria.com.
